name: bludhaven
title: Bludhaven State Penitentiary
summary: When Robin, the Boy Wonder, outgrew the moniker and his tempestuous relationship with Batman reached a breaking point, he established his own identity as the crime-fighting vigilante Nightwing. Operating near Gotham in the equally dangerous city of Bludhaven, he keeps the penitentary busy.</br></br> Explore how data analytics and business intelligence were leveraged to optimize prison operations and improve inmate rehabilitation programs, ultimately transforming the penitentiary into a model institution for correctional facilities worldwide.

name: spat
title: SP Tutoring and Test Prep
summary: This test prep and college admissions consulting business started small, propelled by a passionate heart for for helping local students and their families navigate the pressures of modern academics. In time, it grew to be a signifcant regional player without losing its original identity or its repuation for ''compassionate smarts''.</br></br> Learn about the pipelines used by leadership to power business decisions and lend transparency to operations including payment processing, scheduling, and customer relationship management.
